original_text: It may be that the house of Judah will hear all the disaster that I intend to do to them, so that every one may turn from his evil way, and that I may forgive their iniquity and their sin.”
korean_text: 유다 가문이 내가 그들에게 내리려 한 모든 재난을 듣고 각기 악한 길에서 돌이키리니 그리하면 내가 그 악과 죄를 용서하리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: It may be that the house of Judah will hear
all the disaster that I intend to do to them
so that every one may turn from his evil way
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 각 사람이 자기의 악한 길에서 돌이키고

sentences.original_text: and that I may forgive their iniquity and their sin
